segments.text: You are studying here , aren ’ t you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I have been here for three years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well . I ’ m rather disappointed with it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s too old . And it isn ’ t as specious as I expected .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh.It ’ s awful , but it can ’ t be helped .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ ll just have to put up with it .
segments.speaker: S2
